EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5351 - Relieve Line Listing Reviewer Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET29_PSA_Relieve Line Listing Reviewer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Line Listing Reviewer Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Line Listing Reviewer listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Line Listing Reviewer is:{!Aggregate_Report__c.Line_Listing_Reviewer__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You
